abeyance.e: Target is Stunned for 60 seconds. Ignores armor
abeyance.i: "The strength of aether is mine to evoke" x3
abeyance.name: Abeyance

adaptiveblessing.name: Adaptive Blessing
adaptiveblessing.i: "I enchant thee with this blessing" x3
adaptiveblessing.e: Bearer becomes Resistant to one of the following Schools: Death, Flame, Subdual, Command, Sorcery. School is chosen at the time of casting. Does not count towards a players Enchantment limit.
adaptiveblessing.l: May not be worn with any other Enchantments from the Protection School unless the other Enchantment is (ex).

adaptiveprotection.name: Adaptive Protection
adaptiveprotection.i: "I enchant thee with this protection" x3
adaptiveprotection.e: Bearer becomes Immune to one of the following Schools: Death, Flame, Subdual, Command, Sorcery. School is chosen at the time of casting.

agoraphobia.name: Agoraphobia
agoraphobia.i: "I command thee to be alone" x3
agoraphobia.e: Target must remain at least 20' away from all other living players unless forced there by another Magic or Ability. Lasts 30 seconds.

amplification.name: Amplification
amplification.e: Bearer gains Extension 1/refresh Charge x3. Other sources of Extension may not be utilized while Amplification is worn.
amplification.n: Does not use up any purchased instances of Extension.

ambulant.name: Ambulant
ambulant.keywords: bard druid healer wizard meta magic
ambulant.e: An incantation may be said while moving. May be cast while moving.
ambulant.l: May not be used on the Charge incantation.

ancestralarmor.name: Ancestral Armor
ancestralarmor.i:
"May this armor protect thee from all forms of harm.
May the flames of the fire not burn you.
May the bolts from the heavens not strike you.
May the arrows of your enemies not pierce you.
May this armor protect thee from all forms of harm"
ancestralarmor.e: The effects of a Magic Ball, projectile weapon, or melee weapon which just struck armor worn by the player are ignored, even if the object would not otherwise affect the armor. The armor loses one point of value in the location struck. This effect will not trigger if the armor has no points left in the location struck. Ancestral Armor is not expended after use and will continue to provide protection until removed with Dispel Magic or similar magic or abilities.
ancestralarmor.l: Phase Arrow and Phase Bolt interact with armor worn by the bearer as though Ancestral Armor was not present.
ancestralarmor.n: Engulfing Effects that do not strike the bearer's armor and abilities that ignore armor entirely do not trigger Ancestral Armor.

apex.name: Apex
apex.e: Gain Mutation (T) and Adaptive Blessing (Self) 1/Life Charge x5 (ex) (Swift).
apex.l: Lose all instances of Evolution, Hold Person, Pinning Arrow, and Adaptive Protection

artificer.name: Artificer
artificer.e:
May wield a Small Shield. Gain Greater Mend 2/Refresh Charge x10 (ex). Mend becomes 2/Life Charge x3 (ex).
Casting Mend on Weapons or Shields does not consume a use of Mend.
artificer.l:
Rather than the normal amount of Specialty Arrows for an Archer, gain:
  • Pinning Arrow 3 Arrows / Unlimited (ex)
  • Phase Arrow 1 Arrow / Unlimited (ex)
  • Suppression Arrow 1 Arrow / Unlimited (ex)
Look the Part becomes a fourth Pinning Arrow.
artificer.n: Player must still have a use of Mend remaining to cast on weapons or shields.

assassinate.name: Assassinate
assassinate.l: May only be used immediately upon killing an enemy.
assassinate.n: Assassinate targets the killed enemy and does not require verbal targeting.

astralintervention.name: Astral Intervention
astralintervention.i: "I command thee to retreat into the aether" x 3
astralintervention.e: Target player becomes Insubstantial for 30 seconds.
astralintervention.n: If cast on self, the caster may end this Insubstantial state at any time by using the exit incantation for Insubstantial.

attuned.name: Attuned
attuned.e: May wear an additional Enchantment. Attuned does not count towards the bearer's Enchantment limit
attuned.l: This ability may not be used in conjunction with any other similar ability or magic
attuned.n: If Attuned is removed, the bearer chooses which (m) Enchantments to lose to meet their new Enchantment limit, if necessary

avatarofnature.name: Avatar of Nature
avatarofnature.e: All the casters Enchantments of level 4 and below are now range Self instead of their previous range. Does not apply to Golem

awe.name: Awe
awe.e: Target may not attack or cast Magical abilities at the caster or their carried equipment. Target must remain at least 20' away from the caster unless forced there by another ability. Lasts 30 seconds.
awe.n: If the caster attacks the target, begins casting another Magical abilities at the target or their carried equipment, or dies, this ability's effect is negated.

banish.name: Banish
banish.keywords: banish healer monk wizard insubstantial spirit
banish.i: "The Spirits banish thee from this place" x3
banish.e: Target Insubstantial player must return to their base where their Insubstantial State immediately ends
banish.n: The target's Insubstantial State is replaced with a new insubstantial state from Banish. If the Insubstantial State is ended before reaching the base, the rest of the effect is ended as well. If Banish is cast on self, the caster may end this Insubstantial state at any time by using the exit incantation for Insubstantial.

barkskin.name: Barkskin
barkskin.e: Bearer gains one point of Magic Armor

battlefieldtriage.name: Battlefield Triage
battlefieldtriage.e: Bearer may cast Heal (m) by incanting "<Player> thou art made whole" and removing an enchantment strip. Enchantment is removed when the last strip is removed.

battlemage.name: Battlemage
battlemage.l: May not purchase Enchantments or Magic Balls

bearstrength.name: Bear Strength
bearstrength.i: "I enchant thee with the strength of the bear" x3
bearstrength.e: Bearer's wielded melee weapons are Shield Crushing

berserk.name: Berserk
berserk.e: Bearer's wielded melee weapons are Armor Breaking

berserker.name: Berserker
berserker.l: May not wear Armor, and loses all instances of Blood and Thunder

blessedaura.name: Blessed Aura
blessedaura.i: "I enchant thy person, arms, and armor" x3
blessedaura.e: Resistant to all effects from the next source which would inflict a Wound, Death, State, or negatively affect them or their carried or worn equipment. Does not trigger against effects cast by the player

blessingagainstharm.name: Blessing Against Harm
blessingagainstharm.i: "I enchant thee against all harm" x3
blessingagainstharm.e: Resistant to all effects from the next source which would inflict a Wound, Death, State, or other negative effect. Does not trigger against effects cast by the player

blessingagainstwounds.name: Blessing Against Wounds
blessingagainstwounds.e: Resistant to Wounds. Does not count towards a players Enchantment limit
blessingagainstwounds.l: May not be worn with any other Enchantments from the Protection School unless the other Enchantment is (ex)

blink.name: Blink
blink.e: Player becomes Insubstantial. While Insubstantial in this way, player can move as they wish as long as they remain within 50' from their starting point
blink.l: Caster may not end State within 10' of a living enemy
blink.n: If the Insubstantial State is ended, the rest of the effect is ended as well. Caster may end this Insubstantial state at any time by using the exit incantation for Insubstantial

bloodandthunder.name: Blood and Thunder
bloodandthunder.e: Player gains Blessing Against Wounds
bloodandthunder.n: Player must still wear a white strip to denote Blessing Against Wounds

breakconcentration.name: Break Concentration
breakconcentration.e: Target player is suppressed for 10 seconds

brutalstrike.name: Brutal Strike
brutalstrike.keywords: anti paladin barbarian verbal death cursed suppressed
brutalstrike.e: Victim is Cursed. Victim is also Suppressed for 30 seconds
brutalstrike.n: Brutal Strike targets the wounded or dead player and does not require verbal targeting

calllightning.name: Call Lightning
calllightning.i: "I call lightning's flame to strike thee" x3

circleofprotection.name: Circle of Protection
circleofprotection.e:
The caster and up to five willing players within Touch range of the caster immediately have all States and Ongoing Effects removed and then become Insubstantial.
All targets:
  • May not move from their starting location, and are unaffected by abilities that allow or require the player to move
  • May use abilities on players and their carried equipment who became Insubstantial due to the same casting of Circle of Protection as though they were not Insubstantial
  • May end this Insubstantial State at any time by using the exit incantation for Insubstantial
The caster may end Circle of Protection for all targets at any time by using the exit incantation for Insubstantial. If the Insubstantial State is ended for a target, the Ongoing Effects of Circle of Protection no longer apply to that player
circleofprotection.n: If a player is prevented from becoming Insubstantial, they are unaffected by Circle of Protection

combatcaster.name: Combat Caster
combatcaster.e: Does not require an empty hand to cast Magic.

confidence.name: Confidence
confidence.e: Target player may instantly Charge a single Magic or Ability.
confidence.l: May not be used within 20' of a living enemy.

contagion.name: Contagion
contagion.i: "May thou bear this plague to all" x3
contagion.e: All melee weapons wielded by player are Wounds Kill. Bearer is Fragile

corrosivemist.name: Corrosive Mist
corrosivemist.i: "The mists of corrosion surround thee" x3
corrosivemist.e: Bearer may cast Destroy Armor (m) by incanting "<Player> the mists of corrosion destroy your <:armor location>: armor". Bearer must remove a strip after each use of Destroy Armor. Enchantment is removed when the last strip is removed.

corruptor.name: Corruptor
corruptor.e: Gain Void Touched (Self) 2/Refresh (m). All uses of Terror become 1/Life Charge x10 (m).
corruptor.l: May not wield Great Weapons or Javelins and loses all instances of Flame Blade

coupdegrace.name: Coup de Grace
coupdegrace.keywords: some lowercase separated words used to search
coupdegrace.l: Target must be Wounded when the caster begins the Incantation
coupdegrace.n: Even if the target has no Wounds by the end of the Incantation they still die

dervish.name: Dervish
dervish.e: Equipment costs are doubled. Each Verbal purchased gives double the uses. Example: 1/Life Charge x3 becomes 2/life Charge x3, 2/life becomes 4/life, 1/Refresh becomes 2/Refresh

destroyarmor.name: Destroy Armor
destroyarmor.e: Armor on target hit location is subjected to Armor Destroying
destroyarmor.n: Destroy Armor targets the player but affects the Hit Location. Visibility can be drawn to any part of the player, not just the desired Hit Location. Immunities, resistances, and other protections will only protect the armor from Destroy Armor if they specifically extend to the armor, such as Blessed Aura. Abilities like Enlightened Soul, Protection from Magic, and Adaptive Protection (Death) do not extend to armor and thus cannot protect against Destroy Armor. Ancestral Armor does not protect against verbal magic and thus cannot protect against Destroy Armor

destructionarrow.name: Destruction Arrow
destructionarrow.m: Arrow with red head cover labeled "Destruction"
destructionarrow.e: This arrow is Armor Destroying and Shield Destroying. Armor Destroying and Shield Destroying are applied after the normal effect of being hit with an arrow is applied

dimensionalrift.name: Dimensional Rift
dimensionalrift.i: "The power of the aether consumes thee" x3

discordia.name: Discordia
discordia.i: "My discordant melodies shall stymie my foes" x3
discordia.e: Bearer may cast Break Concentration (m) by incanting ">:Player< thou art suppressed" and removing an enchantment strip. Enchantment is removed when the last strip is removed.

dispelmagic.name: Dispel Magic
dispelmagic.keywords: druid healer scout wizard verbal sorcery
dispelmagic.i: "By my power I dispel that magic" x3
dispelmagic.e: All Enchantments on target are removed
dispelmagic.n: Will always remove enchantments if successfully cast on a valid target, regardless of the player's Traits, States, Immunities, Ongoing Effects, or Enchantments (except Sleight of Mind)

draggedbelow.name: Dragged Below
draggedbelow.i: "Death comes for thee from below" x3

elementalbarrage.name: Elemental Barrage
elementalbarrage.i: "I am filled with the power of magic"
elementalbarrage.e: Caster may use Magic Balls they are currently carrying by stating the name of the Magic Ball immediately prior to throwing the ball in place of the incantation
elementalbarrage.l: This magic ends if the caster picks up any additional Magic Balls or begins casting any new Magical abilities.
elementalbarrage.n: The effect is not an incantation, and so is not stopped by being Suppressed, and may be used while moving, etc.

empower.name: Empower
empower.e: Target player regains one use of any per-life Ability or Magic they have expended
empower.l: Does not function on Empower, Confidence, or Restoration
empower.n: Does not allow a player to have more than their maximum uses of a Magic or Ability.

enlightenedsoul.name: Enlightened Soul
enlightenedsoul.i: "A distant magic has no hold upon thy now enlightened soul" x3
enlightenedsoul.e: Player is unaffected by Verbal Magical abilities used at a Range greater than Touch.
enlightenedsoul.l: Affects beneficial as well as harmful Magical abilities.
enlightenedsoul.n: Does not affect (ex) abilities, abilities with a Range of Touch, or abilities whose Range is greater than Touch but are used at a Range of Touch anyway.

entangle.name: Entangle
entangle.keywords: druid healer wizard ball subdual stopped
entangle.i: "The strength of earth is mine to evoke" x3
entangle.e: Target is Stopped for 60 seconds. Engulfing

equipmentarmor1point.name: Equipment: Armor, 1 Point
equipmentarmor1point.e: Your class maximum armor limit increases one additional point

equipmentshieldmedium.name: Equipment: Shield, Medium
equipmentshieldmedium.e: May wield up to a medium shield

equipmentweapongreat.name: Equipment: Weapon, Great
equipmentweapongreat.e: May wield one great weapon at a time for each instance purchased (but may carry extras)

equipmentweaponhinged.name: Equipment: Weapon, Hinged
equipmentweaponhinged.e: May wield one hinged weapon at a time for each instance purchased (but may carry extras)

equipmentweaponlong.name: Equipment: Weapon, Long
equipmentweaponlong.e: May wield one long weapon at a time for each instance purchased (but may carry extras)

equipmentweaponshort.name: Equipment: Weapon, Short
equipmentweaponshort.e: May wield one short weapon at a time for each instance purchased (but may carry extras)

essencegraft.name: Essence Graft
essencegraft.i: "I enchant thee with essence graft" x3
essencegraft.e: Bearer may wear up to three additional Enchantments. Essence Graft does not count towards the bearer's Enchantment limit
essencegraft.l: Bearer may only wear (m) Enchantments from the caster of Essence Graft. This ability may not be used in conjunction with any other similar ability or magic
essencegraft.n: If Essence Graft is removed, the bearer chooses which (m) Enchantments to lose to meet their new Enchantment limit, if necessary

evoker.name: Evoker
evoker.e: Verbals purchased may only be of range Touch or Self. Elemental Barrage becomes Charge x10
evoker.n: Elemental Barrage must still be purchased

evolution.name: Evolution
evolution.e: May wear an additional Enchantment. Evolution does not count towards the bearer's Enchantment limit
evolution.n: This ability does work in conjunction with Attuned, Essence Graft, or Phoenix Tears so long as the other limitations of those Enchantments are followed

experienced.name: Experienced
experienced.e: A single per-life Verbal purchased becomes Charge x5 in addition to the normal frequency OR a single per- refresh Verbal purchased becomes Charge x10 in addition to the normal frequency. This Verbal must be determined before the game begins and cannot be changed
experienced.l: Verbal must be 4th level or lower

extendimmunities.name: Extend Immunities
extendimmunities.i: "May the blessing of my god protect thee" x3
extendimmunities.e: The target player gains either Immune to Command or Immune to Death
extendimmunities.l: Type of Ability must be chosen at the time of casting and may not be changed. The caster may only have one instance of Extend Immunities active at a time

extension.name: Extension
extension.keywords: bard druid healer wizard meta magic
extension.e: Verbal becomes 50'. Only works on verbals with a range of 20'

fingerofdeath.name: Finger of Death
fingerofdeath.i: "I call upon death to smite thee" x3

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.i: "The flame of fire is mine to evoke" x3
fireball.e:
Fireball will have one of the following effects on the object first struck:
1. A weapon hit is destroyed
2. A shield hit is subject to Shield Destroying
3. Armor hit with Armor Points remaining is subject to Armor Destroying
4. A player hit dies.

flameblade.name: Flame Blade
flameblade.i: "The element of fire shall infuse your weapons" x3
flameblade.e: Bearer's wielded melee weapons are Armor Breaking and Shield Crushing. Bearer and their wielded weapons are Immune to Flame.

forcebolt.name: Force Bolt
forcebolt.keywords: druid wizard monk bolt ball sorcery
forcebolt.e:
Force Bolt will have one of the following effects on the object first struck:
1. A weapon hit is destroyed
2. Armor hit with Armor Points remaining is subject to Armor Breaking
3. A player hit receives a Wound to that hit location

giftofair.name: Gift of Air
giftofair.i: "I grant thee a gift of the air" x3
giftofair.e: The effects of a melee weapon or projectile which just struck the bearer are ignored, instead the bearer announces "Gift of Air" and becomes Insubstantial. If the bearer is wearing armor it is affected as normal in addition to triggering Gift of Air. Bearer may choose to return directly to their base immediately after Gift of Air activates. Melee weapons with the Armor Breaking, Armor Destroying, Shield Crushing, or Shield Destroying Special Effects will affect the bearer as normal and do not trigger Gift of Air.
giftofair.l: Bearer may not wield weapons or shields
giftofair.n: Bearer may end the Insubstantial state caused by Gift of Air at any time with the standard Incantation

giftofearth.name: Gift of Earth
giftofearth.i: "I grant thee a gift of the earth" x3
giftofearth.e: Bearer gains one point of magic armor and is affected as per Harden.

giftoffire.name: Gift of Fire
giftoffire.i: "I grant thee a gift of the fire" x3
giftoffire.e: Bearer is Immune to Flame and gains Heat Weapon 1/Refresh Charge x3

giftofwater.name: Gift of Water
giftofwater.i: "I grant thee a gift of the water" x3
giftofwater.e: Bearer gains one point of magic armor and Heal (self- only) unlimited (m)

golem.name: Golem
golem.i: "From earth and clay I form thee" x3
golem.e: Bearer is Immune to Death. Bearer is Cursed. Bearer can remove a Wound via Mend. Bearer may use the caster as an alternate respawn point while the caster is alive. Bearer may treat the caster as a base for the purposes of the effects which require the teammate to go to their base. Non-magical armor worn affected as per Imbue Armor. All Enchantments worn by the Bearer, including Golem, are Persistent while Golem is worn
golem.l: A caster may only have a single Golem Enchantment active at a time
golem.n: Greater Mend and Word of Mending will not remove a wound

greaterharden.name: Greater Harden
greaterharden.i: "I enchant thee with Greater Harden" x3
greaterharden.e: Shields and weapons wielded by the player are affected as per Harden. May only be cast on a player

greaterheal.name: Greater Heal
greaterheal.i: "By the grace of the divine thou art healed" x5
greaterheal.e: All wounds are healed. Ignores the Cursed State

greatermend.name: Greater Mend
greatermend.i: "Return this [object name] to its former glory" x5
greatermend.e: Will restore all armor points in one location or repair a damaged or broken item

greaterrelease.name: Greater Release
greaterrelease.i: "From all thine afflictions thou art released" x2
greaterrelease.e: All ongoing effects and States are removed from the target. The caster may choose to leave some States or effects in place
greaterrelease.n: Greater Release may target Dead players. When used to end a State or Ongoing Effect imposed by a magic or ability with multiple effects, all other States and Ongoing Effects from the same source are also ended

greaterresurrect.name: Greater Resurrect
greaterresurrect.i: "By the grace of the divine thou art resurrected" x5
greaterresurrect.e: Target dead player who has not moved more than 5' from where they died is returned to life. Any wounds on the player are healed. Works regardless of any States on the target, and removes Cursed if present
greaterresurrect.n: Enchantments on the player are retained

guardian.name: Guardian
guardian.e: Gain Imbue Shield (Touch) 1/Life (m) and Martyr 2/Life Charge x3 (ex).
guardian.l: Lose all instances of Protection from Magic and Extend Immunities. May only have one instance of Imbue Shield active at a time.

harden.name: Harden
harden.e: Bearer's wielded weapons or shield may only be destroyed or damaged by Magic Balls/Verbals which affect objects e.g. Fireball or Pyrotechnics
harden.l: Will only affect either the weapons or the shield of the bearer, not both

heal.name: Heal
heal.keywords: druid healer monk paladin scout verbal spirit heal
heal.i: "The white light of healing hath healed thee" x5

heartoftheswarm.name: Heart of the Swarm
heartoftheswarm.i: "Let all those who oppose the hive feel the wrath of the swarm" x3
heartoftheswarm.e: Bearer is Stopped. Any player on the bearer's team may use the bearer as their respawn point as per the normal game rules. Players respawning at the caster do so by announcing "My life for the swarm." Players on the bearer's team may treat the bearer as a base for the purposes of the effects which require the teammate to go to their base
heartoftheswarm.l: Players can not respawn at the bearer if there are living enemy players or a game objective within 20' of the bearer

heatweapon.name: Heat Weapon
heatweapon.i: "I call upon flame to heat that [type of weapon]" x3
heatweapon.e: Target weapon may not be wielded for 30 seconds. Players who are Immune to Flame may continue to wield the weapon
heatweapon.n: The equipment, not the person, is the target of Heat Weapon. The equipment is the only thing required to be within range and visible for this ability to affect it

holdperson.name: Hold Person
holdperson.keywords: assassin healer scout wizard verbal command
holdperson.e: Target player becomes Stopped for 30 seconds

hunter.name: Hunter
hunter.e:
May wield Great Weapons and Javelins.
Pick One:
  • Hold Person becomes 1/Life Charge x3 (ex).
  • Pinning Arrow becomes 2 Arrows / Unlimited (ex).
hunter.l: May not wield Shields. Loses all instances of Release and Evolution
hunter.n: You only gain the benefit of an option if you already have that ability.

iceball.name: Iceball
iceball.i: "The strength of ice is mine to evoke" x3
iceball.e: Target player becomes Frozen for 60 seconds. Engulfing

icyblast.name: Icy Blast
icyblast.e: Target player becomes Frozen for 30 seconds

imbuearmor.name: Imbue Armor
imbuearmor.keywords: druid warrior enchantment protection armor white
imbuearmor.i: "I enchant thee with Imbued Armor" x3
imbuearmor.e: All armor worn by the bearer gains a +1 modifier. This modifier may allow the armor to exceed the maximum value for its type, up to the bearer's class maximum
imbuearmor.n: Does not apply to magic armor. A player may only benefit from one instance of Imbue Armor, or similar magic and abilities that increase Armor Points, at a time

imbueshield.name: Imbue Shield
imbueshield.keywords: healer paladin enchantment protection white shield
imbueshield.i: "This shield shall neither bend nor break" x3
imbueshield.e: Shield wielded by the player cannot be destroyed nor damaged. Engulfing effects hitting the wielded shield are ignored

imbueweapon.name: Imbue Weapon
imbueweapon.i: "I enchant thee to slay all foes" x3
imbueweapon.m: Bearer's wielded melee weapons are Wounds Kill.

infernal.name: Infernal
infernal.e: Gain Fireball 2 Balls / Unlimited(m). Flame Blade becomes 2/Refresh Charge x5 (self).
infernal.l: May not wield Shields. Lose all instances of Steal Life Essence.

innate.name: Innate
innate.keywords: bard druid healer wizard meta magic
innate.e: May be used to instantly Charge a single ability by stating its name

inquisitor.name: Inquisitor
inquisitor.l: Player loses all instances of Greater Resurrect and Awe

insult.name: Insult
insult.e: Target is unable to attack or cast Magical abilities at anyone other than the caster or their carried equipment for 30 seconds, or until either party dies. If the target of Insult is attacked or has Magical abilities cast on them or their carried equipment by someone other than the caster, the target of Insult becomes able to choose to attack the offending party as well.
insult.n: If the caster of Insult dies, the victim's effect is negated.

ironskin.name: Ironskin
ironskin.e: Bearer is Immune to Flame and gains two points Magic Armor affected as per Ancestral Armor

juggernaut.name: Juggernaut
juggernaut.e: Replace Harden with Greater Harden at the same frequency. Gain Phoenix Tears (Self) 3/Refresh (ex) (Swift) and Imbue Armor (T).
juggernaut.l: Lose all instances of Ancestral Armor and True Grit

legend.name: Legend
legend.e: Each Extension purchased gives double the uses. Example: 1/life becomes 2/life. Swift may not be purchased or used

lightningbolt.name: Lightning Bolt
lightningbolt.i: "The flame of storms is mine to evoke" x3
lightningbolt.e:
A player struck is subject to an Engulfing Stopped effect for 60 seconds. In addition Lightning Bolt will have one of the following effects on the object first struck:
1. A weapon hit is destroyed
2. Armor hit with Armor Points remaining is subject to Armor Breaking
3. A player hit receives a Wound in that hit location

lost.name: Lost
lost.i: "I command thee to be lost" x3
lost.e: Player becomes Insubstantial and must move directly to their base. Player must end their Insubstantial State as per normal once they reach their base
lost.n: If the Insubstantial State is ended before reaching the base, the rest of the effect is ended as well. If Lost is cast on self, the caster may end this Insubstantial state at any time by using the exit incantation for Insubstantial

lycanthropy.name: Lycanthropy
lycanthropy.e: Bearer gains two points of magic armor. Bearer's wielded melee weapons are Shield Crushing. Bearer is Immune to Command

marauder.name: Marauder
marauder.e: Gain Momentum Unlimited (ex) (Ambulant). Insult becomes 1/Life Charge x5 (m) (Ambulant).
marauder.l: Maximum Armor becomes 4pts. May not wield Large Shields. Ancestral Armor is no longer chargeable.

martyr.name: Martyr
martyr.e: A single State is removed from target willing player. The caster gains the removed State with a new duration of 10 seconds
martyr.l: Cannot be cast while Cursed. Caster may not remove themselves from Insubstantial states gained this way

masshealing.name: Mass Healing
masshealing.i: "Let the powers of healing flow through me" x3
masshealing.e: Caster may Heal (m) a player at Touch range, by stating "I grant thee healing". and removing an enchantment strip. Enchantment is removed when the last strip is removed.
masshealing.n: The effect is not an incantation, and so is not stopped by being Suppressed, and may be used while moving, etc.

medium.name: Medium
medium.e: Gain Blessing Against Wounds (Touch) 1/Life (ex), Sever Spirit 1/Life Charge x3 (ex), and Swift 2/Life (ex). Abilities in the Spirit School become Charge x3.
medium.l: May not wear armor and may not wield Great Weapons.

mend.name: Mend
mend.keywords: archer bard druid healer wizard verbal sorcery
mend.i: "I make this item whole again" x5
mend.e: Destroyed or damaged item is repaired, or one point of armor in one location is repaired

missileblock.name: Missile Block
missileblock.e: Player may block arrows, projectile weapons, and Magic Balls with their hands and wielded melee or thrown weapons. Any arrow, projectile weapon or magic ball blocked is nullified.

momentum.name: Momentum
momentum.e: May be used to instantly Charge a single ability by stating its name.

mutation.name: Mutation
mutation.e: Enchantments worn by the player are Persistent.

mystic.name: Mystic
mystic.e: Gain Force Bolt 4 Balls / Unlimited (m). Gain Suppression Bolt 2 Balls / Unlimited (m).
mystic.l: May not wield Great Weapons nor Heavy Thrown.

naturalizemagic.name: Naturalize Magic
naturalizemagic.e: Bearer may cast Dispel Magic (m) by incanting "<Player> thou art dispelled." and removing an enchantment strip. Enchantment is removed when the last strip is removed.

necromancer.name: Necromancer
necromancer.e: All abilities purchased in the Death School become Charge x3. You may have a combined total of five Undead Minion Enchantments
necromancer.l: You may not purchase any abilities from the Protection School

persistent.name: Persistent
persistent.e: Enchantment returns with the user after respawning until it has been otherwise removed
persistent.n: Persistent enchantments with limited uses (Mass Healing, Corrosive Mist, etc.) will retain the number of uses they had remaining. Persistent Magic Armor behaves like normal armor: it will be repaired upon Respawning or retain any prior damage if the bearer is returned to life by some other method, such as Resurrect

phasearrow.name: Phase Arrow
phasearrow.m: Arrow with grey cover labeled Phase'
phasearrow.e: This arrow does not interact with ongoing Magic or Abilities. Example: This arrow is not stopped by Stoneskin, Protection from Projectiles, and does not trigger the effects of Troll Blood, Undead Minion, Missile Block, or similar Magic or Abilities
phasearrow.n: This arrow does not supercede the Frozen, Insubstantial, or Invulnerable States

phasebolt.name: Phase Bolt
phasebolt.i: "The power of sorcery is mine to evoke" x3
phasebolt.e:
This Magic Ball does not interact with other ongoing Magic or Abilities. Example: This Magic Ball is not stopped by Stoneskin, Protection from Projectiles, and does not trigger the effects of Troll Blood, Undead Minion, Missile Block, or similar Magic or Abilities. Will have one of the following effects:
1. A weapon hit is destroyed
2. Armor hit with Armor Points remaining is subject to Armor Breaking
3. A player hit receives a Wound in that hit location
phasebolt.n: Does not supercede the Frozen, Insubstantial, or Invulnerable States

phoenixtears.name: Phoenix Tears
phoenixtears.i: "May the tears of the phoenix wash over thee" x3
phoenixtears.e:
Enchanted player does not die as normal. When the player would otherwise die they instead remove a strip and become Frozen for 30 seconds. When the Frozen State is ended the bearer has:
1. All Wounds removed
2. All States removed that are removed by Death or Respawning
3. All ongoing effects with a timer are expired
4. All of their carried or worn equipment is fully repaired
5. All other enchantments, except those which are Persistent, are removed
Additionally Phoenix Tears allows you to wear an extra Enchantment from the Protection School. This extra enchantment is considered Persistent as long as Phoenix Tears is present. The additional Enchantment is not removed once Phoenix Tears is removed
phoenixtears.n: Phoenix Tears is removed when the last strip is removed

pinningarrow.name: Pinning Arrow
pinningarrow.m: Arrow with yellow head cover labeled Pinning'
pinningarrow.e: A player struck by this arrow is Stopped for 30 seconds. Engulfing

planargrounding.name: Planar Grounding
planargrounding.i: "My power closes the aether to you" x3
planargrounding.e: Target player has their Insubstantial State removed and may not become Insubstantial for 30 seconds. May be cast on players who are not currently Insubstantial
planargrounding.n: Planar Grounding causes Enchantments that automatically render their bearer Insubstantial, such as Undead Minion, to fail and be removed if they activate while Planar Grounding is in effect

poison.name: Poison
poison.keywords: anti paladin assassin druid enchantment death
poison.i: "I coat these weapons with a deadly poison" x2
poison.e: The next wound dealt by the bearer with a wielded melee weapon is Wounds Kill
poison.n: If the target does not actually receive a wound, e.g. by a Resistance, Poison is not expended.

poisonarrow.name: Poison Arrow
poisonarrow.m: Arrow with green head cover labeled Poison'
poisonarrow.e: This arrow is Wounds Kill

poisonglands.name: Poison Glands
poisonglands.i: "Thou shalt secrete poison from thy venemous glands" x3
poisonglands.e: Bearer gains self-only Poison (ex) 1/Refresh Charge x3

priest.name: Priest
priest.e: Meta-magic may only be used on Spirit magics. All Meta-Magics purchased become 1/Life Charge x3. Heal costs zero points

protectionfrommagic.name: Protection from Magic
protectionfrommagic.keywords: healer wizard paladin enchantment protection white magic
protectionfrommagic.i: "I enchant thee with protection from magic" x3
protectionfrommagic.e: Bearer is unaffected by Magical abilities from any school. Upon death the player is Cursed
protectionfrommagic.n: This effect does not interact with other Enchantments worn by the bearer.

protectionfromprojectiles.name: Protection from Projectiles
protectionfromprojectiles.i: "I enchant thee with Protection from Projectiles" x3
protectionfromprojectiles.e: Bearer is unaffected by ammunition, thrown javelins, rocks, and throwing weapons. Engulfing effects from those objects, such as Pinning Arrow, do not affect the player
protectionfromprojectiles.n: Equipment can still be affected by the above. Does not protect bearer against Magic Balls

pyrotechnics.name: Pyrotechnics
pyrotechnics.i: "I call upon the element of flame to destroy thy belongings" x3
pyrotechnics.e: All shields and weapons carried or worn by the target player are destroyed
pyrotechnics.l: Only affects shields and weapons carried or worn when the Verbal is completed
pyrotechnics.n: Pyrotechnics targets the player but affects their equipment. Immunities, resistances, and other protections will only protect the equipment from Pyrotechnics if they specifically extend to the equipment, such as Blessed Aura or Flame Blade. Abilities like Enlightened Soul, Protection from Magic, and Adaptive Protection (Flame) do not extend to equipment and thus cannot protect from Pyrotechnics

rage.name: Rage
rage.e: Caster is unaffected by Verbal abilities and their wielded melee weapons are Shield Crushing and Armor Breaking for seven seconds. Caster must count this time out loud, audible to 50'; failure to count ends the effect.

raider.name: Raider
raider.e: Player may choose to use Adrenaline for its usual effect or to instantly charge Brutal Strike. Brutal Strike becomes 3/Life Charge x3. Gain Harden (Self) 1/Life (ex)
raider.l: May not wield Shields, and loses all instances of Rage

raisedead.name: Raise Dead
raisedead.e: Target Dead player who has not moved more than 5' from where they died is returned to life and is Cursed. Target is also Suppressed for 30 seconds. Non-Persistent Enchantments on the player are removed before the player returns to life. Any Wounds on the player are healed.

ranger.name: Ranger
ranger.e: The cost of all available Equipment is reduced to zero points. May use bows. The cost of all Enchantments is doubled

regeneration.name: Regeneration
regeneration.i: "I grant thee the power of regeneration" x3
regeneration.e: Bearer gains Heal (Self) Unlimited (m) (Swift)
regeneration.l: The Heal granted by Regeneration may not be used within 10' of a living enemy

release.name: Release
release.keywords: bard druid healer scout wizard verbal sorcery
release.i: "From thy bindings thou art released" x5
release.e: A single ongoing effect or State is removed from the target. Casters choice
release.l: Cannot remove Cursed. When used to end a State or Ongoing Effect imposed by a magic or ability with multiple effects, all other States and Ongoing Effects from the same source are also ended

reload.name: Reload
reload.i: "I nocked my arrows to my bow, I let them fly, my quiver is low. Now I pause to go reload." x3
reload.e: Player becomes Invulnerable and may move about the field retrieving their arrows. The player may remove their Invulnerable state in the location they started or at base by stating, "I return with a full quiver" x3
reload.l:
Must stay at least 10' away from other players at all times
A player may not exit Reload at an alternate base location, such as Heart of the Swarm, in this way.
reload.n: May ask reeve for assistance in retrieving arrows that are within 10' of other players

restoration.name: Restoration
restoration.i: "I restore thee to thy full potency"
restoration.e: Player has all uses of their per-life Magic and Abilities restored
restoration.l: Does not function on Empower, Confidence, or Restoration

resurrect.name: Resurrect
resurrect.keywords: druid healer monk paladin verbal spirit heal
resurrect.i:
Sword Cut, spear stab, mace smash, arrow jab,
Let the white light of healing descend on thee
Let the white light of healing stop thy spilling blood
Let the white light of healing mend thy bones
Let the white light of healing close thy wounds.
Let the white light of healing restore thy vigor.
The white light of healing hath resurrected thee.
resurrect.e: Target Dead player who has not moved from where they died is returned to life. Non-Persistent Enchantments on the player are removed before the player returns to life. Any Wounds on the player are healed

ruffian.name: Ruffian
ruffian.e: Regain a use of Coup de Grace if you successfully cast Assassinate on a player after killing them with a Thrown Weapon. You do not gain the effect if the dead player is unaffected by Assassinate.
ruffian.l: May not wield Long Weapons or Bows.

sacredblades.name: Sacred Blades
sacredblades.i: "I sanctify these weapons to smite the wicked" x2
sacredblades.e: Bearer's wielded weapons are affected as per Harden. Bearer's wielded melee weapons ignore magic armor and resistances that prevent wounds

sanctuary.name: Sanctuary
sanctuary.e: Player and their carried equipment are unaffected by hostile actions originating from within 20'. Must Chant "sanctuary". Player may end Sanctuary at any time by ceasing to chant and declaring "No longer in sanctuary" or by by picking up a weapon with their hand.
sanctuary.l: If the player is voluntarily touching (other than blocking) or carrying weapons in any fashion (tucked under arms, tied to thongs, etc) at any point during Sanctuary then they may only voluntarily end Sanctuary within 20' of a friendly base, and must continue chanting until there. Player may not cast this ability while they have any weapons in hand. Cannot interact with game items nor game objectives, nor impede the play of other people in any manner, and must immediately move to avoid such situations. May not come within 20' of a non-friendly base
sanctuary.n: The exit declaration must be audible out to 20 feet

scavenge.name: Scavenge
scavenge.e: Destroyed or damaged item is repaired, or one point of armor in one location is repaired.

severspirit.name: Sever Spirit
severspirit.i: "The spirits lay a curse on thee." x3
severspirit.e: May only target dead players. Player is Cursed. Any Enchantments on the player are removed
severspirit.n: Will always remove enchantments if successfully cast on a valid target, regardless of the player's Traits, States, Immunities, Ongoing Effects, or Enchantments

shadowstep.name: Shadow Step
shadowstep.e: Player becomes Insubstantial. Shadow Step may be cast while moving.
shadowstep.n: Caster may end this Insubstantial state at any time by using the exit incantation for Insubstantial

shakeitoff.name: Shake It Off
shakeitoff.e: 10 seconds after casting Shake It Off the player may remove from themselves any number of States or Ongoing Effects of their choice. Shake It Off may be cast at any time the player is alive, even while the player would otherwise be prevented from casting abilities by Stunned, Suppressed, or similar

shatterweapon.name: Shatter Weapon
shatterweapon.i: "My power destroys thy [type of weapon]" x3
shatterweapon.n: The equipment, not the person, is the target of Shatter Weapon. The equipment is the only thing required to be within range and visible for this spell to affect it

shove.name: Shove
shove.keywords: bard healer wizard verbal sorcery stopped
shove.e: Target player is moved back 20' in a straight line away from the caster. Works on Stopped players

silvertongue.name: Silver Tongue
silvertongue.e: Bearer gains Swift 1/refresh Charge x3. Other sources of Swift may not be utilized while Silver Tongue is worn
silvertongue.n: Does not use up any purchased instances of Swift

sleightofmind.name: Sleight of Mind
sleightofmind.e: Enchantments worn by the bearer, other than Sleight of Mind, are not removed by Dispel Magic or similar Magic and Abilities. Does not count towards the bearer's Enchantment Limit

snaringvines.name: Snaring Vines
snaringvines.i: "The hands of the earth rise to your bidding" x3
snaringvines.e: Bearer may cast Hold Person (m) by incanting "<Player> stop at my command." and removing an enchantment strip. Enchantment is removed when the last strip is removed.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.e: May physically carry any number of Specialty Arrows of each type. The frequency of each type of Specialty Arrow Ability becomes 1/Life Charge x3. Gain Momentum Unlimited (ex) (Ambulant).

songofbattle.name: Song of Battle
songofbattle.e: Bearer's wielded melee weapons are Armor Breaking. Bearer must Chant "Song of Battle" or sing a song regarding their martial prowess. Singing in place of the normal Chant is still a Chant and must follow all Chant rules

songofdeflection.name: Song of Deflection
songofdeflection.e: Bearer is unaffected by ammunition, thrown Javelins, Rocks, and thrown weapons. Engulfing effects from those objects, such as Pinning Arrow, do not affect the player. Bearer must Chant Song of Deflection or sing a song of their acrobatic prowess. Singing in place of the normal Chant is still a Chant and must follow all Chant rules
songofdeflection.n: Does not protect the bearer against Magic Balls.

songofdetermination.name: Song of Determination
songofdetermination.e: Bearer is Immune to Command. Bearer must Chant "Song of Determination" or sing a song regarding their determination. Singing in place of the normal Chant is still a Chant and must follow all Chant rules.

songoffreedom.name: Song of Freedom
songoffreedom.e: Bearer can not receive the States Stopped, Frozen, or Insubstantial unless caused by the bearer or other enchantments they carry. Bearer must Chant "Song of Freedom" or sing a song of roving or rambling. Singing in place of the normal Chant is still a Chant and must follow all Chant rules

songofinterference.name: Song of Interference
songofinterference.i: "I sing a song of dark magic thwarted"
songofinterference.e: As per Enlightened Soul. Bearer must Chant "Song of Interference" or sing a song about defeating/resisting the forces of magic. Singing in place of the normal Chant is still a Chant and must follow all Chant rules

songofpower.name: Song of Power
songofpower.e: Friendly players within 20' of the bearer have their Charging Incantation repetitions divided by 2, rounded down, to a minimum of 1. Bearer is Stopped. Bearer must Chant Song of Power or sing an inspiring song. Singing in place of the normal Chant is still a Chant and must follow all Chant rules
songofpower.l: Players can only benefit from one instance of Song of Power at a time

songofsurvival.name: Song of Survival
songofsurvival.i: "I sing of my numerous close calls"
songofsurvival.e: When the bearer would otherwise die, they instead announce Song of Survival and become Insubstantial. The caster treats the triggering event as though it had no effect on them other than triggering Song of Survival. Song of Survival immediately ends and bearer must stop their Chant. Bearer may choose to return directly to their base immediately after Song of Survival activates. Bearer must Chant Song of Survival or sing a song regarding their many escapes from certain doom. Singing in place of the normal Chant is still a Chant and must follow all Chant rules
songofsurvival.l: Once Song of Survival has activated to protect the bearer it may not activate again on the same life
songofsurvival.n: Bearer may end the Insubstantial state caused by Song of Survival at any time with the standard Incantation. If the Insubstantial State is ended by any means before reaching the base, the rest of the effect is ended as well

songofvisit.name: Song of Visit
songofvisit.i: "I sing to entertain friend and foe" x3
songofvisit.e: Bearer cannot be Wounded and is Immune to all schools. Bearer is Stopped. Bearer must Chant "Song of Visit" or sing a song regarding their general good nature and friendly disposition. Singing in place of the normal Chant is still a Chant and must follow all Chant rules. When Song of Visit is removed player becomes Insubstantial and must immediately move directly to their base. Upon arrival, they must immediately end the effect as per Insubstantial
songofvisit.l: Bearer may not wield weapons, interact with game objects, impede play, gain further Enchantments, or target any player
songofvisit.n: This Enchantment can be removed by Dispel Magic and similar Magic and Abilities

sphereofannihilation.name: Sphere of Annihilation
sphereofannihilation.i: "The power of void is mine to evoke" x3
sphereofannihilation.e:
Sphere of Annihilation ignores armor and enchanments and will have one of the following effects on the object first struck:
1. A weapon struck is destroyed
2. A shield hit is subject to Shield Destroying
3. A player hit dies and is Cursed.
sphereofannihilation.n: Does not ignore Traits, such as Missile Block.

spy.name: Spy
spy.e: Blink and Shadow Step become Charge x3 (ex).

steallifeessence.name: Steal Life Essence
steallifeessence.keywords: anti paladin healer wizard verbal death charge
steallifeessence.e: Caster may heal a Wound or instantly Charge an ability
steallifeessence.l: May only be used on a dead player. That player is Cursed. Does not work on Cursed players. The caster does not gain the effect if the dead player is unaffected
steallifeessence.n: In order to charge an ability, the name of the ability being charged must still be stated immediately after the incantation.

stoneform.name: Stoneform
stoneform.e: Caster is Frozen. May end this State at any time by saying "the earth release me" x2

stoneskin.name: Stoneskin
stoneskin.i: "May nature protect thee from all forms of attack" x3
stoneskin.e: Bearer gains 2 points of Magic armor affected as per Ancestral Armor

stun.name: Stun
stun.i: "By the power of white light I stun thee" x3
stun.e: Target player is Stunned for 30 seconds

summondead.name: Summon Dead
summondead.e: Target willing dead player must go directly to the caster. Upon reaching the caster, Summon Dead immediately ends. Wherever the player is when Summon Dead ends is treated as where the player died
summondead.l: May be used on a dead player who has not moved more than 5' from where they died or who is at their respawn

summoner.name: Summoner
summoner.e: Each Enchantment purchased gives double the uses. Example: 1/Life Charge x3 becomes 2/life Charge x3, 2/ life becomes 4/life
summoner.l: May not purchase Verbals with a range other than Touch or Self. May not purchase equipment beyond 2nd level

suppressionarrow.name: Suppression Arrow
suppressionarrow.m: Arrow with purple head cover labeled Suppression'
suppressionarrow.e: A player struck by this arrow is Suppressed for 30 seconds. Engulfing

suppressionbolt.name: Suppression Bolt
suppressionbolt.i: "The strength of suppression is mine to evoke" x3
suppressionbolt.e: Target is Suppressed for 60 seconds. Engulfing

swift.name: Swift
swift.keywords: bard druid healer wizard monk meta magic
swift.e: Magic and abilities require only a single iteration of the incantation. For multi-line Incantations use the last line
swift.l: May only be used on Magic and Abilities at a range of Ball, Touch, or Self. May not be used on the Charge incantation

teleport.name: Teleport
teleport.keywords: assassin druid healer wizard verbal sorcery insubstantial
teleport.e: Target willing player becomes Insubstantial and moves directly to a chosen location chosen by the caster at the time of casting. This must be a fixed location (not relative to a player or to a moveable object). Upon arrival, they must immediately end the effect as per Insubstantial
teleport.n: If the player's Insubstantial state is removed before they have reached their destination, the effects of Teleport end. If Teleport is cast on self, the caster may end this Insubstantial state at any time by using the exit incantation for Insubstantial

terror.name: Terror
terror.e: Target may not attack or cast Magical abilities at the caster or their carried equipment. Target must remain at least 50' away from the caster unless forced there by another ability. Lasts 30 seconds.
terror.n: If the caster attacks the target, begins casting another Magical ability at the target or their carried equipment, or dies, this ability's effect is negated.

throw.name: Throw
throw.e: Target player is moved back 50' in a straight line away from the caster. Works on Stopped players

tracking.name: Tracking
tracking.e: Target Insubstantial player immediately has their Insubstantial effect ended

trickery.name: Trickery
trickery.e: Bearer may cast Blink, Shadow Step, and Teleport on themselves while they are already Insubstantial, provided that they were the cause of the initial Insubstantial State and entered it voluntarily. Doing so removes the original Insubstantial effect.

trollblood.name: Troll Blood
trollblood.i: "The blood of the trolls sustains thee" x3
trollblood.e: Enchanted player does not die as normal. When the player would otherwise die they instead ignore the triggering effect as though it had not occurred, remove a strip, and become Frozen for 30 seconds. The bearer is treated as though they have the effects of Regeneration in addition to the above
trollblood.n: Troll Blood is removed when the last strip is removed

truegrit.name: True Grit
truegrit.i: "The wicked flee when I pursue" immediately after dying
truegrit.e: Player returns to life with their Wounds healed and is immediately Frozen for 30 seconds
truegrit.n: Enchantments on the player are retained

undeadminion.name: Undead Minion
undeadminion.i:
Flesh rots, bones break, skulls sigh, spirits take let the power of my will descend on thee
let the power of my will restore thy spirit
let the power of my will knit thy corpse
let the power of my will give thee direction
let the power of my will cheat thy death
by the power of my will, arise my minion!
undeadminion.e: Bearer is Cursed. When the bearer dies, they must return to the caster. While the bearer is enchanted, the caster gains Raise Dead (Unlimited) (m) which can only be cast with the bearer as the target, and ignores the requirement for the bearer to have not moved from where they died. For the duration of the Enchantment, the bearer may treat the caster as a base for the purposes of the effects which require the bearer to go to their base. This enchantment is persistent, and remains active while the bearer is dead.
undeadminion.l: The caster may not have more than three active Undead Minion Enchantments.

vampirism.name: Vampirism
vampirism.i: "Thy hunger can never be sated" x3
vampirism.e: Player gains Adrenaline unlimited (ex), is Immune to Death, and is Cursed. Bearer's Adrenaline ability will work through their Cursed State

voidtouched.name: Void Touched
voidtouched.i: "Embrace the old ones and surrender thyself" x3
voidtouched.e: Bearer's wielded melee weapons are Armor Breaking. Bearer may use Shadow Step 1/Refresh Charge x30 (ex), Steal Life Essence unlimited (ex), and is unaffected by Magical Abilities from the Sorcery, Spirit, and Death Schools. May still benefit from their own Steal Life Essence. Player is Cursed
voidtouched.n: This effect does not interact with other Enchantments worn by the bearer

warder.name: Warder
warder.e: Each Enchantment purchased in the Protection School gives double the uses. Example: 1/Life Charge x3 becomes 2/life Charge x3, 2/life becomes 4/life
warder.l: Player may not purchase any magic from the Death, Command, or Subdual Schools

wardself.name: Ward Self
wardself.i: "The power of magic defends me" x3
wardself.e: Resistant to all effects from the next source which would inflict a Wound, Death, or State. Does not trigger against effects cast by the player

warlock.name: Warlock
warlock.e: Each Verbal purchased in the Death and Flame Schools gives double the uses. Example: 1/Life Charge x3 becomes 2/life Charge x3, 2/life becomes 4/life
warlock.l: Player may not purchase Verbals from any School other than the Death and Flame Schools

wordofmending.name: Word of Mending
wordofmending.e: All equipment carried by target player is repaired. All armor worn by target player is restored to full value
wordofmending.l: May not be cast within 20' of a living enemy

wounding.name: Wounding
wounding.e: Target hit location on target player is Wounded
wounding.l: Has no effect on players already Wounded
wounding.n: Wounding targets the player but affects the Hit Location. Visibility can be drawn to any part of the player, not just the desired Hit Location
